markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Sekhmet (Lady of Slaughter)](/Deities.aspx?ID=58)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Ancient Osirian Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=3)

**Edicts** Slaughter your enemies, drink the blood of defeated foes, heal battle injuries

**Anathema** Spare an evil fiend, fail to placate Sekhmet with daily rituals

**Follower Alignments**
N, CG, CN, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9)

**Favored Weapon** [claw](/Weapons.aspx?ID=1) or [Battle Axe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=16)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=8), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15), [Indulgence](/Domains.aspx?ID=16), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345)

- **4th**
[Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362)

- **5th**
[Moon Frenzy](/Spells.aspx?ID=203)

</column>
name: Sekhmet (Lady of Slaughter)
